flawed_nl_solution:
She reads 90-60=<<90-60=20>>20 pages in an hour.
She needs to read 210-90=<<210-90=120>>120 more pages.
For an additional 120 pages, she will need 120/20=<<120/20=6>>6 hours.
#### 6

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 20. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
